name: Coconut Sambol (Pol Sambol)
description: Spicy coconut condiment with chili, onions, and lime
ingredients: Few curry leaves, chopped (fresh, not dried)
instructions: In a large bowl, combine grated coconut and salt
Add chili powder and mix well
Add chopped curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Squeeze lime juice over the mixture
Mix everything thoroughly with your hands
Serve immediately or store in refrigerator
cultural_notes: Pol sambol is the most essential Sri Lankan condiment, served with every meal Must be freshly made - sambol loses flavor if stored too long. Maldive fish (umbalakada) is essential and irreplaceable. Use coconut scraped fresh, not desiccated.

sinhala: අත්තම පොල් ගාලා හැදුවොත් රස වැඩි
english: Use fresh coconut for best taste
Can be stored for 2-3 days refrigerated

description_sinhala: මිරිස්, ළූණු සහ දෙහි සමග සැර පොල් කුළු බඩු
description_tamil: மிளகாய், வெங்காயம் மற்றும் சுண்ணாம்பு கொண்ட காரமான தேங்காய் கான்டிமென்ட்
cultural_notes_sinhala: පොල් සම්බෝලය සෑම ආහාර වේලක් සමඟම පිරිනැමෙන ශ්‍රී ලංකාවේ අත්‍යවශ්‍යම කුළුබඩුවක් වේ
cultural_notes_tamil: போல் சம்போல் என்பது இலங்கையின் மிகவும் அத்தியாவசியமான காண்டிமென்ட் ஆகும்
